ii_desc: This everyday gardening tool  increases movement speed so you can whack more enemies.
Be the handyman of the battlefield and nail your opponents to the ground.
That's not how this tool is supposed to be used, but when you're mad anything is game.
Rotating metal teeth? Check. Just watch out for the kickback!
우클릭 유지 시 방패로 방어한다. 대신 이동 속도가 감소함.
A well-balanced weapon with a chirp you'll hear from across the battleground.
Pepper your enemies with rapid fire before they even know what hit them.
Leave your enemies with a brutal sting after you attack them with the Hornet.
It's no elementary weapon, the Sherlock packs a lot of power!
Lightweight, fast firing with an accurate point. A rifle for the versatile fighter.
Get nice and close to your enemies with this killer shotgun. Show no mercy.
With your loaded ammo at the tip of your shotgun, watching your opponents get killed just got sweeter.
Bombard your competition with blast after blast! They won't know what hit them.
This weapon will drive any trespassers with a loose screw out of your playground.
Don't like Plums? Have a Peach instead!
This sniper will always get your team out of a long distance jam.
Prey on your enemies with the massive Sea Eagle. Survival of the fittest.
Fire your Venom on the competition and your toxicity will cause extermination!
연사가 가능한 대신 공격력이 다소 떨어지는 스나이퍼 총.
The Merlin Falcon may just pull a rabbit out of its hat, or maybe it will pull a bullet out from the back of your ear.
A heavy duty bullet monster with average cool time. Only the greatest MicroVolts can handle this beast.
Impress your enemies with the DareDev, they'll wonder how you pull off your awesome stunts!
Make your presence known using the Firefly, they'll be glowing with envy.
Crank up the heat and bring your A game. It'll blow your enemies out of the water!
기동이 빠르며 화염을 발생시켜 근접한 다수의 적들을 공격하기에 적합한 범위무기.
A silver rocket launcher that packs a serious sting. Your enemies will cower in fear.
Is it a sniper or a bazooka? If you want to confuse your enemies, do it with the Mimic!
Show them you're a real heavyweight when they see you running with the Pound.
Switch up your game play, carry a rocket in your pocket. Vengeance at your finger tips!
Added gold for style, with the same classic RCBB you know and love.
Grill your enemies with the power of grenades. Just add ketchup!
Resurrect your team's chances with the Pulse. Your enemies will be checking their own heart rate!
Use the Exile and send your competition packing. They'll never want to face you again.
The forecast? Heavy clouds, showers and deafening Thunder!
IBT, CBT, OBT
